seo.metaTitle: About Kermit Floor | SPC Flooring, Skirting & Wall Panels Manufacturer
seo.metaDescription: Learn about Kermit Floor, a leading manufacturer of SPC flooring, skirting, and wall panels. Discover our commitment to quality, innovation, and sustainable practices.

hero.title: About Kermit Floor
hero.subtitle: We manufacture SPC flooring, SPC skirting boards and SPC wall panels—designed for durability, fast installation and consistent project results.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.p1: Kermit Floor is a manufacturer focused on SPC-based interior finishing systems: SPC flooring, SPC skirting boards, and SPC wall panels. Our product development is rooted in long-term experience in polymer processing and mold-making, enabling tight control over design details, repeatability and production consistency.
whoWeAre.p2: We build products that are practical for the trade—stable, durable, and easy to work with—while keeping the look clean and modern for residential and commercial environments.

flooring.title: SPC Flooring
flooring.text: Rigid-core flooring systems engineered for everyday durability and a reliable installation outcome across a wide range of interior spaces.

skirting.title: SPC Skirting Boards
skirting.text: Skirting solutions designed to finish the wall–floor junction cleanly. Our skirting boards feature flexible edges to improve the final fit on uneven surfaces.

wallPanels.title: SPC Wall Panels
wallPanels.text: Interior wall panel systems designed for fast installation, impact resistance and consistent decorative results.

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer Mindset
manufacturer.text: Consistent production, stable specs, repeatable quality.

design.title: Design Control
design.text: Mold-driven design capability enables detail control and product evolution.

system.title: System Approach
system.text: Flooring + skirting + wall panels designed to work together for a complete finish.

footprint.title: Manufacturing & Supply Footprint
footprint.p1: We operate with a production and supply structure built for both domestic projects and export workflows. Our goal is simple: reliable availability, clear documentation, and predictable results for distributors, contractors and project buyers.
footprint.ctaText: We support distributor/dealer structures and project-based supply. Contact our sales team for product documentation, samples and commercial terms.

sustainability.title: Sustainability & Responsibility
sustainability.p1: We prioritize long service life, practical installation, and responsible manufacturing. Our production is increasingly supported by renewable energy, and we continuously invest in efficient processes that reduce waste and environmental impact. We remain firmly committed to ethical business practices—fair partnerships, transparent operations, and consistent quality standards—so customers can specify Kermit Floor products with confidence.

finalCta.title: Build complete SPC interiors with a manufacturer-backed system.

seo.title: Kermit Floor | Contact Us!
seo.description: Contact Kermit Floor for sales, technical support, or partnership inquiries. We are a leading manufacturer of SPC flooring, skirting, and wall panels.

hero.title: Contact Us
